title: Streamlining the ACSI4 Bootcamp Demo Day Email

messages.content:
can you help me clean up this email and make it easier to skim and know what to do? 
"""Salam amazing ACSI alumni, 

By now, you should have the invitation to the ACSI4 Bootcamp Demo Day in your Google calendar. 

I wanted to create this thread to connect you together and to start the conversation. Tomorrow insha'allah we'll have 20 mins to discuss your projects, your journey with Bloom in the ACSI program, and any advice you might want to share with the new ACSI teams. 

We'll also encourage you to join us in the selection process and to watch the pitching at the end. It should be an exciting day. 

Feel free to share some instagram handles/project and life updates in this thread. See you all soon! 

+BG""

content.text:
can you help me clean up this email and make it easier to skim and know what to do? 
"""Salam amazing ACSI alumni, 

By now, you should have the invitation to the ACSI4 Bootcamp Demo Day in your Google calendar. 

I wanted to create this thread to connect you together and to start the conversation. Tomorrow insha'allah we'll have 20 mins to discuss your projects, your journey with Bloom in the ACSI program, and any advice you might want to share with the new ACSI teams. 

We'll also encourage you to join us in the selection process and to watch the pitching at the end. It should be an exciting day. 

Feel free to share some instagram handles/project and life updates in this thread. See you all soon!

messages.content:
I'd be happy to help you clean up this email to make it more skimmable and action-oriented. Here's my revised version:

```
Subject: ACSI4 Bootcamp Demo Day - Action Items & Connection Thread

Salam ACSI alumni,

Quick updates for tomorrow's Demo Day (in calendar):

ACTION ITEMS:
• Prepare to discuss your projects and ACSI journey (20 min session)
• Share advice for new ACSI teams
• Consider joining the selection process
• Plan to attend pitch presentations

Optional: Share your Instagram handles and personal/project updates in this thread.

Looking forward to an exciting day with you all!

+BG
```

This version:
- Adds a clear subject line
- Uses bullet points for key actions
- Groups information by importance
- Removes unnecessary praise words
- Makes the time commitment clear
- Maintains the friendly tone while being concise

Would you like me to adjust anything specific about this version?
